title: Add 5% max-diameter margin so the breathing circle never touches the outer border

requirements.text: Update the Player breathing circle sizing so that at its maximum expansion the circle maintains a visible margin to the outer boundary: the margin must equal 5% of the circle’s maximum diameter (i.e., when fully expanded, the circle’s max diameter must be 1/1.1 ≈ 90.909% of its square container, creating the required margin). Ensure the circle never covers/touches the external border during the inhale expansion animation.

quotes: WHEN THE circle expands, it covers the external border, have 5% margin between the 2

acceptanceCriteria: During the inhale (expand) animation, the circle does not touch or overlap the outer boundary of its container.

The gap between the circle edge (at maximum expansion) and the outer boundary equals 5% of the circle’s maximum diameter (equivalently: circle max diameter is ~90.909% of the container’s square size).
The change applies consistently across common mobile viewport sizes (no edge contact at max expansion).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change breathing timing, phase logic, or voice/haptics behavior as part of this request.
Do not redesign the Player screen layout beyond the circle sizing/margin behavior.
